OpenSatKit Core Flight System (cFS) starter kit
About Blog Contact

Welcome to OpenSatKit!

OpenSatKit provides a complete open source desktop solution for learning how to use NASA’s open source flight software (FSW) platform called the core Flight System (cFS). The kit uses Ball Aerospace’s COSMOS command and telemetry system, NASA’s cFS, and a NASA dynamic simulator called 42. NASA Core Flight System (cFS) Ball Aerospace COSMOS...
